title: UDS Options: Deprecation

fields.label: Enable v1 hero metabox?
fields.name: uds-depreciation-panel-v1-hero
fields.instructions:
Enabling this option restores the early-generation hero metabox that appears at the bottom of the editor for all pages. It also restores the ability to toggle on/off the page title in favor of the metabox information.

The hero metabox has been replaced by a new ACF-powered Gutenberg block which allows for the reuse of other "component" blocks within like the native header block. See this pull request for further information [link]

Remediation efforts for this content should be completed by [date], at which point this option will be disabled.

description: A theme options panel for the UDS-WordPress Deprecation Helper plugin.
